title: Library. University of Idaho. ca. 1900
description: By this time the library had expanded into a second (reading) room.
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library, #93515

title: Mary Belle Sweet
description: M. Belle Sweet, in later years, University of Idaho's first professional librarian.

title: Gym
description: Bookcases take a backseat to athletics in this 1907 photo showing the library's collection, far left, housed in the gymnasium's wings.
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library. #1-54-06.

title: Hitting the books at library study tables"
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library, #1-281-15

title: Study tables
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library, #1-201-01

title: Prank article from the Argonaut
description: Article features a photo of multi-storey office tower in downtown Spokane as image of 'The New Library'

title: Loan desk
description: Students checking out books in 1936, while student clerks sort books behind the counter. The library still had 'closed stacks', inaccessible to most students.
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library, #1-201-10.

title: The library's second-floor periodicals reading room
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho Library, #1-201-15

title: Library display
description: Library displays in 1943 featured daily war reports on the 'Pacific Battlefield' and other fronts.
source: Historical Photographs Collection, University of Idaho, #92-1249a
